flawed_nl_solution:
Andy blew up 50 balloons - the 12 balloons Ashley blew up = <<50-12=38>>38 balloons.
We know how long it took Andy to blow up 2 balloons, so 38 balloons / 2 = <<38/2=91>>91 time increments.
We know the time increment is 5 minutes, so 91 x 5 minutes = <<91*5=455>>455 minutes.
#### 455

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 19, not 91. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
